name: subterraneanly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
literary secretly, or in a hidden way: He's conducted a subterraneanly low-profile campaign so far. This dissatisfaction spreads subterraneanly, undermining the edifice of the comfortable society.
under the ground: The company has received permits to subterraneanly cross the National Park with the pipeline. This particular species lives subterraneanly in the muddy soil of the rainforest.
More examplesFewer examplesSome of his other concerns played out much more subterraneanly.The limestone pool is fed subterraneanly by the Atlantic ocean.
